channel.title: [PI] How do I use <col=###> function? [PI]
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Well I just discovered my client uses the hex thingy. Only problem is, it's not working for me and I'm not quite sure how I get it working.... If anyone can help that would be great! :D
Thanks, RuneWings317

item.title: [PI] How do I use <col=###> function? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:2, topic:474085”] private final int[] anIntArray965 = { };

Client class

EDIT: Can’t remember the named.

Oh wait, you’re talking about something different? Are you referring to the Hex used in PhP?[/quote]

Yes, in (mostly) newer revision clients, using tags to alter the text color, shadows, etc.

The col tag is the color in the message, in RGB hexadecimal format. Something like

<col=ff0000>

Read full topic
